DOC.brief_summary: The aim clinical study determine efficacy plasma cholesterol-lowering water dispersible formulation plant sterol ( WD-PS ) preparation versus plant sterol ester ( PS-ester ) , consume within dairy product .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Plant Sterol-Fortified Dairy Product Plasma Lipid Plant Sterol Concentrations Humans
DOC.detailed_description: Forty-seven hyperlipidemic subject ( 25 male 22 female , age 19-75 year baseline ) complete double-blind , randomize , crossover study .
DOC.criteria: healthy individual age 1960 yr plasma LDLC level > 3.0mmol/l TG < 4.5mmol/l body mass index ( BMI ) 20 30 kg/m2 . history recent chronic use oral hypolipidemic therapy , include fish oil , probucol within last 3 month history chronic use alcohol ( > 2 drinks/d ) smoke myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass , sitosterolaemia , kidney disease , liver disease major surgical procedure within last six month
